You can select an existing inventory source and the products will be loaded from the chosen source. If you choose to create a new inventory source for the current location, the source will be created automatically after saving the location. If you had assigned products to the location, you can transfer them to the new inventory source by selecting the check-box "Transfer previously selected products to the new inventory source"
